title: Does TikTok really gather data from the user's SIM card? - Quora

response.answer_text: They say that they will collect the data of your location, but having access to your handset, God knows what all they collect. The more free things we look for, the more we get involved and our information is stolen and stored elsewhere to be exploited for commerce. You simply visit some website, within minutes your mail box is full of information related to that website and some marketing calls also chase you. Without any app to interface, if someone can do it, imagine what could be done with an app which could be programmed to do so many things?

Location data We collect information about your location, including location information based on your SIM card and/or IP address. With your permission, we may also collect Global Positioning System (GPS) data From tiktok
